name: VR SynthShip Shootout
description:
VR SynthShip Shootout is a game prototype made in about a month. Where you shoot enemy spaceships arcade style. 

As of now the game was made for Oculus Rift and it does not support any other VR platform.

Any constructive feedback is appreciated.

Inputs:

To hold the gun you must grab with both hands at the same time, using the hand triggers. 

To fire the gun you must press both index triggers at the same time as well.

Default aiming scheme is inverted, following how a gun would behave in a tripod.

Team:

ONCGM - Game programmer.

Nahuy - 3D Artist.
